formula.name: Abs General Quadratic Minus
formula.reference: Xrn = (Cr + (( - 1 * (Xi * Xi)) + (Xr * Xr))); Xin = ((Ai * (Xr * Xr)) + ((2 * (Ar * abs((Xi * Xr)))) + Ci));
formula.perturbation: xrn = (cr + (( - 1 * (xi * xi)) + ((2 * (Xr * xr)) + (( - 2 * (Xi * xi)) + (xr * xr))))); xin = ((Ai * (xr * xr)) + ((2 * ((Ai * (Xr * xr)) + (Ar * diffabs((Xi * Xr),((Xi * xr) + (xi * (Xr + xr))))))) + ci));
